𒉋 ≈ 𒉈 NE neo "new"

𒉋 #edēšum 𒂊 𒁲𒋗 ʰe-de-šu <> حَدُثَ ḥaduṯa “new” חִדֵּשׁ ḥiddéš renew” 𒉋 #edēšum (durative iddiš, perfect ītediš, preterite īdiš, imperative ediš) 𒉋 PEL / GIBIL to be new, fresh, renewed

bí 𒉈 pyro paḫḫur 𒉺𒀪𒄯 fire
